page.title: 10 THE CREAM OF THE CROP
page.content: Among Scotland's chief exports are those products related to milk such as cream,tinned Scots evaporated milk and Scottish cheddar cheese, which are in demand in countries as far away as North and Central Africa, Turkey and Iran. Much of the credit for the success of these products is due to the skill and industry of the people employed at the {Hannah Research Institute,}which is a government run organisation near Ayr. Not content to work strictly with dairy products the researchers have recently concocted another brew more typical of Scottish exports_a liqueur, called Heather Cream, which is also becoming one of Scotland's top selling exports.
